item.description:
Dear Group members,

Happy new year to you and your family and love one!

Year of 2013 is here. I am very grateful to welcome year of 2013 and wish this year will be a spiritual brightness and peaceful year.

 

I am welcome all of you to join me to start the year with balance our body, mind and spirit.

Let's get together and send out the great energy to world.

 

Hope see you all, may you have a great year of 2013

 

Jonathan
item.how_to_find_us: It will be the second building on the right when you drive into condo, you can park with visitor parking sign. You can call my cell at 617-223-7166
item.name: Westborough Spirituality January Meetup
